sources.title: The Camels Are Coming
sources.description: Title: The Camels Are Coming Summary: A British officer in the Camel Corps in Egypt goes undercover to investigate a gang of drug smugglers. He enlists the aid of a female pilot to help break up the gang. Directed by: Tim Whelan, Robert Stevenson Actors: Production Company: Gainsborough Pictures Release Date: 31 December 1934 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A British officer in the Camel Corps in Egypt goes undercover to investigate a gang of drug smugglers. He enlists the aid of a female pilot to help break up the gang.
